body:
Rotational Dynamics with balls-bearings [MC 1.9+]

Hello! I was looking for cool videos in YouTube about command blocks in 1.9 and I found a video that is quite interesting and confusing at the same time.
This video is about what you can do with the new command blocks added in the new version of Minecraft.

Those concepts were created by: GamerGuppy & Onnowhere (subscribe to their channels, they upload good content)
If you are interested in their work, see the video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o1QheXQdJYg

So, What do you think about these concepts? Are they good for Map Making?

Thanks for reading me, see you later.
